typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SurveyTransactionId as long,
		ApplicationSourceId as integer,
		Guid as string,
		SurveyId as integer,
		SurveyDescription as string,
		StartSurveyDateTime as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		Q01 as string,
		Q02 as string,
		Q03 as string,
		Q04 as string,
		Q05 as string,
		Q06 as string,
		Q07 as string,
		Q08 as string,
		Q09 as string,
		Q10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from vwADF_GDMPhotoTaking\n',
	format: 'query') ~> SurveyTransaction
source(output(
		Number as string,
		Name as string,
		BasisNumber as string,
		Street as string,
		SubTradeChannelID as string,
		TradeNameID as string,
		OperationalRegionID as string,
		MarketTypeID as string,
		CACCustomer as string,
		DirectIndicator as string,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SR_CODE as string,
		SR_Name as string,
		DSM_Code as string,
		DSM_Name as string,
		SM_Code as string,
		SM_Name as string,
		GM_Code as string,
		GM_Name as string,
		GM_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from vwADF_EdsGdmCustomers',
	format: 'query') ~> Customers
SurveyTransaction, Customers join(CustomerNumber == Number,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinToCustomer
JoinToCustomer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToData
